name: WIPP Pyramid plugin
title: WIPP Hedgehog Pyramid building
description: Pyramid building using NIST accelerated C++ algorithm
author: Timothy Blattner and Mylene Simon
institution: National Institute of Standards and Technology
citation: Peter Bajcsy , Antoine Vandecreme, Julien Amelot, Joe Chalfoun, Michael Majurski, and Mary Brady. "Enabling Stem Cell Characterization from Large Microscopy Images (pdf)". IEEE Computer, July, 2016

inputs.name: minThresholdScaler
inputs.description: The minimum threshold used for scaling images, if min/max are the same, then scaling is disabled [default: 0]

inputs.name: maxThresholdScaler
inputs.description: The maximum threshold used for scaling images, if min/max are the same, then scaling is disabled [default: 0]
